Terms & Conditions for Shubhkarya

Last Updated: July 26, {new Date().getFullYear()}

Welcome to Shubhkarya! These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Shubhkarya website and services (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Shubhkarya, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old and capable of entering into a legally binding agreement. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

2. Services Description

Shubhkarya is an online platform that facilitates the booking of Hindu Pandits/Priests for various religious ceremonies (Pujas) and related spiritual services. We act as an intermediary connecting users with verified Pandits. We do not directly perform the Pujas but ensure the booking and communication process is smooth.

3. User Responsibilities

  • Account Information: You agree to provide accurate, complete, and current information when creating your account and booking services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login credentials.
  • Lawful Use: You agree to use the Services only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of, or restrict or inhibit the use and enjoyment of this site by any third party.
  • Payment: You agree to pay all fees and charges associated with the services you book through Shubhkarya.
  • Conduct: You agree to treat Pandits and our staff with respect and to adhere to all instructions provided by the Pandit during the performance of the service.

4. Booking and Payment

  • Booking Confirmation: All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by the Pandit. You will receive a confirmation once your booking is accepted.
  • {/* Corrected: Ensured '}}' before '>' */} Payment Process: Payments are processed securely through our platform. Full payment is typically required at the time of booking.
  • Cancellations & Refunds: Cancellation and refund policies may vary depending on the Pandit and the specific service booked. Details will be provided at the time of booking. Generally, a full refund may be provided for cancellations made within a specified period (e.g., 24-48 hours before the service), after which partial or no refunds may apply.

5. Pandit Services

  • Verification: Shubhkarya endeavors to verify the credentials and experience of all Pandits listed on our platform. However, we do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of any Pandit's profile information.
  • Service Quality: While we strive for high-quality service, Shubhkarya is not responsible for the actual performance of the Puja or the conduct of the Pandit during the service. Any disputes should be first addressed directly with the Pandit, and then with Shubhkarya if necessary.

6. Intellectual Property

All content on the Shubhkarya website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Shubhkarya or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content without our express written permission.

7. Disclaimers

The Services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties, express or implied. Shubhkarya does not warrant that the Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, secure, or that any defects will be corrected. We do not make any guarantees regarding the availability or success of any specific Pandit or Puja.

8. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Shubhkarya shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (a) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Services; (b) any conduct or content of any third party on the Services, including without limitation, any defamatory, offensive, or illegal conduct of other users or Pandits; or (c) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content.

9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Shubhkarya, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs, arising out of or in any way connected with your access to or use of the Services or your breach of these Terms.

10. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution

These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Hathras, Uttar Pradesh, India.

11. Changes to Terms

{/* Corrected: Ensured '}}' before '>' */} We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. By continuing to access or use our Services after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

12. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

Email: info@shubhkarya.com

Mobile: +91 98765 43210

Address: 123 Divine Path, Spiritual Nagar, Hathras, Uttar Pradesh, India - 204101
